extension.description: Streams de rádio da M80 Radio, e rádios online temáticas. Este addon não é oficial da rádio M80, sendo feito por fãs e cujo conteúdo foi encontrado livremente disponível na internet.

Радио TuneIn е безплатна услуга, която ви позволява да слушате всичко, независимо къде се намирате. Каквото желаете - музика, спорт или новини. Радио TuneIn предлага над 50 000 станции от които да избирате. Можете да намерите местните станции или да откриете нови станции от целия свят. Радио TuneIn ви отвежда точно където желаете да сте.

TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be.

TuneIn Radio ist ein kostenloser Service, mit dem Sie alles in der Welt, wo immer Sie sind, hören können. Ob Sie Musik, Sport, Nachrichten oder aktuelle Ereignisse hören wollen. TuneIn Radio hält über 50.000 Sender für Sie bereit. Von der Suche nach lokalen Sender, bis zum entdecken neue Sender aus der ganzen Welt. TuneIn Radio bringt Sie, wohin sie wollen.

TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.

Το ραδιόφωνο TuneIn είναι μία δωρεάν υπηρεσία το οποίο σας επιτρέπει να ακούτε οποιοδήποτε σταθμό από όλο τον κόσμο, από όπου και αν βρίσκεστε. Ακόμη και αν θέλετε να ακούσετε μουσική, αθλητικά γεγονότα, ειδήσεις και άλλα γεγονότα, το ραδιόφωνο TuneIn προσφέρει πάνω από 50.000 σταθμούς για εσάς να διαλέξετε. Είτε θέλετε να ακούσετε τοπικούς σταθμούς είτε να ανακαλύψετε νέους από όλο τον κόσμο, το ραδιόφωνο TuneIn σας πηγαίνει όπου θελήσετε να βρεθείτε.

Todos os programas gravados são retirados dos canais oficiais das emissoras no YouTube, e todo o conteúdo é de responsabilidade das mesmas.

extension.news: - add optional ResolveURL - ResolveURL default when URLResolver and ResolveURL are present
extension.summary: Find and resolve media from a url to play or open.
extension.description:
PlayThis will attempt to find and resolve* media from a url to play or open. A history list is available for future use, exporting to .m3u/.strm** and sending to a remote PlayThis add-on. Supports video, audio, images and executable***. * resolves using ResolveURL(optional) or URLResolver(optional), and youtube-dl ** exported .m3u/.strm is only usable in Kodi w/ PlayThis installed *** 'executable' items are urls with potential results available through scraping
Companion browser extension available on the Chrome Web Store and Mozilla's AMO Gallery
Artwork by @konsumer420
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
Quasar Burst is a lean and mean multi-provider for Quasar.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers.
extension.license: WTFPL, Version 2, December 2004. See included LICENSE.
